attributes.action: drinking, voting, smoking ages should be done by school year like the army
attributes.additional_details: The age for becoming an adult and being able to drink, vote and have more freedom should be changed to a fairer system of the age being changed from 18 to the school year you are in. You are no less mature if you are in the same year at school but jus happen to be born in August. This law would be a lot fairer and also benefit everyone at the same time.
